info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: My family and I really enjoyed staying here and felt right at home. We are big on cooking at home and the kitchen was well stocked with utensils and cooking range for us to be able to do that. The place is ideally situated wherein it’s private and yet you can easily walk to the road to find transport and other shopping features. I recommend this place if you want a home away from home in Chittagong.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: It was a fabulous stay. Will highly recommend
Inside: Beautifully organized house with all the amenities you may need. Outside: Quiet with beautiful surrounding. I liked the place.

From the moment I stepped foot into the house, I was captivated by its charm and attention to detail. The interior decor was tastefully done, striking the perfect balance between modern elegance and cozy comfort. Every room had its unique character, and the overall ambiance was inviting and warm.
The host's thoughtfulness truly shone through every aspect of my stay. The house was immaculately clean, and all the amenities provided were of top-notch quality. The kitchen was fully equipped with all the essentials, making it a joy to cook meals and enjoy them in the beautiful dining area. The comfortable beds, plush linens, and fluffy towels added a touch of luxury, ensuring a restful and rejuvenating stay.
Overall, my stay at Sadman’s house was nothing short of fantastic. The combination of a well-designed space, impeccable cleanliness, thoughtful amenities, and a gracious host made it a truly memorable experience.
